§ 4142. Notification to claimants Each award or denial of a claim by the Commission, whether rendered before or after a hearing, shall include a specific statement of the facts and of the reasoning of the Commission in support of its conclusion. (July 3, 1948, ch. 826, title II, § 212, as added Pub. L. 87–846, title I, § 103, Oct. 22, 1962, 76 Stat. 1111.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 2017k of the former Appendix to this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
